statements: SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC, title ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, inventor FROM patents WHERE status = 'approved'
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT inventor, status FROM patents WHERE status = 'pending' ORDER BY inventor ASC
SELECT title FROM patents WHERE title LIKE '%AI%'
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY filing_date DESC, title ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT title, inventor FROM patents WHERE status='APPROVED' AND filing_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE inventor LIKE '%Smith%' OR inventor LIKE '%Johnson%'
SELECT patent_id, title FROM patents WHERE filing_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01'
SELECT inventor, COUNT(*) AS patent_count FROM patents GROUP BY inventor HAVING COUNT(*) > 1 ORDER BY patent_count DESC
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT title, inventor FROM patents;
SELECT id, inventor, filing_date FROM patents WHERE category='Technology';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM patents WHERE category = 'Technology';
SELECT title, inventor, category FROM patents WHERE filing_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, inventor, filing_date FROM patents WHERE category = 'Healthcare' AND filing_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_patents FROM patents;
SELECT p.title, ip.description FROM patents p INNER JOIN intellectual_property ip ON p.id = ip.patent_id WHERE ip.status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT inventor_name, application_date FROM patents WHERE approval_date IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM industrial_inventions WHERE industry_type = 'Technology';
SELECT invention_name, inventor_id FROM industrial_inventions ORDER BY invention_id DESC;
SELECT property_type, property_description FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE inventor_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM patents ORDER BY patent_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT inventor_name, approval_date FROM patents WHERE application_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM industrial_inventions JOIN patents ON industrial_inventions.inventor_id = patents.patent_id WHERE industry_type = 'Technology' ORDER BY invention_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT property_type, property_description FROM intellectual_property_rights WHERE inventor_id = 3;
SELECT inventor_name, approval_date, application_date FROM patents WHERE approval_date IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT inventor_name, invention_description FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, inventor_name, patent_date FROM patents ORDER BY patent_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM intellectual_property WHERE ip_type='Trademark';
SELECT inventor_name, invention_count FROM inventors WHERE invention_count > 5;
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_id, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE patent_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT inventor_name, invention_description FROM patents WHERE inventor_name LIKE '%Smith%';
SELECT company_name, industry FROM companies ORDER BY industry ASC;
SELECT ip_owner, filing_date FROM intellectual_property WHERE ip_type = 'Trademark';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_name, inventor_name FROM patents WHERE patent_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT industry_name, industry_sector FROM industries ORDER BY industry_name DESC;
SELECT patent_name, inventor_name, patent_date FROM patents ORDER BY patent_date ASC;
SELECT inventor_name, inventor_country FROM inventors WHERE inventor_country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM patents;
SELECT patent_name, inventor_name, patent_date FROM patents ORDER BY patent_date DESC;

SELECT patents.patent_name, patents.patent_date, industries.industry_name FROM patents INNER JOIN patents_industries ON patents.patent_id = patents_industries.patent_id INNER JOIN industries ON patents_industries.industry_id = industries.industry_id;

SELECT inventors.inventor_name, industries.industry_name FROM inventors INNER JOIN patents ON inventors.inventor_name = patents.inventor_name INNER JOIN patents_industries ON patents.patent_id = patents_industries.patent_id INNER JOIN industries ON patents_industries.industry_id = industries.industry_id WHERE industries.industry_sector = 'Technology';

SELECT COUNT(patents.patent_id) AS num_patents, industries.industry_sector FROM patents INNER JOIN patents_industries ON patents.patent_id = patents_industries.patent_id INNER JOIN industries ON patents_industries.industry_id = industries.industry_id GROUP BY industries.industry_sector ORDER BY num_patents DESC;
